data_table.description: Bone Mineral Density of Hip and Spine, Offspring, Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008. This dataset includes Offspring participants who participated in the Osteoporosis Study Offspring Exam 7.5 (2002 - 2005) and/or Exam 8 Callback Osteoporosis Exam (2005 - 2008), though some may have participated only in either the Exam 7.5 or Exam 8 callback.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f7_5nbmd
variable.description: Femoral neck bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f7_5tobmd
variable.description: Femur total bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f7_5trbmd
variable.description: Femoral trochanter bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f7_5side
variable.description: Femur scan side for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s7_5l2bd
variable.description: Spine L2 bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s7_5l3bd
variable.description: Spine L3 bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s7_5l4bd
variable.description: Spine L4 bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s7_5l24bd
variable.description: Spine L2-L4 bone mineral density for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f8cbnbmd
variable.description: Femoral neck bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f8cbtobmd
variable.description: Femur total bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f8cbtrbmd
variable.description: Femoral trochanter bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f8cbside
variable.description: Femur scan side for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s8cbl2bd
variable.description: Spine L2 bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s8cbl3bd
variable.description: Spine L3 bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s8cbl4bd
variable.description: Spine L4 bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s8cbl24bd
variable.description: Spine L2-L4 bone mineral density for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: f7_5scdt
variable.description: Femur scan date for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008

variable.name: s7_5scdt
variable.description: Spine scan date for exam 7.5
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008
variable.value: Unknown or did not participate in Exam 7.5

variable.name: f8cbscdt
variable.description: Femur scan date for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008
variable.value: Unknown or did not participate in femur scan Exam 8 callback

variable.name: s8cbscdt
variable.description: Spine scan date for exam 8 callback
variable.coll_interval: Scans done from January 2002 through July 2008
variable.value: Unknown or did not participate in spine scan Exam 8 callback
